dct_title_s: Hiroshima, Hiroshima Prefecture, Honshu, Japan. A.M.S. L902
dct_description_sm: AMS 1 Alternate title: Hiroshima, Japan. Polyconic projection. Names transcribed according to modified Hepburn (Romaji) system. Relief shown by 10 meter contour interval and spot elevations. Depth shown by fathoms. In upper left margin: "Japan city plans 1:12,500". Includes "Glossary".
dct_publisher_sm: Washington, D.C. : Army Map Service, U.S. Army, 1946.
